response.overview: Zaila was left for dead... But before she took her last breath, she made a deal with a demon from the pits of hell. Fueled by an insatiable desire for revenge, she vows to get even with every person who contributed to the loss of her child, her husband and the attempt on her own life. No one is safe on her hit list as Zaila sets off on her quest enduring unspeakable injury and unscrupulous enemies. Hell hath no fury like a woman scorned...
response.title: This Way to Hell
